name: Panic! (itch) (mattnaps)
description:
Mechanics and design by Julie Arcala, Matt Napolillo, Ambrose Karella, Zachary Suarez.

This digital component was built by Matt Napolillo.

*  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ *

Rules are in the attached PDF. 
Made for an experimental games class. 

Note: Panic! requires physical components
Preferred setup is a 12x12 laminated board, a bunch of pieces of paper, a player piece, and a dry erase marker.
